data.title: The Marriage of Princess Beatrice, 23rd July 1885.
data.meta_description: Princess Beatrice (1857-1944) was the youngest child of Queen Victoria and Prince Albert. She married Prince Henry of Battenberg in Whippingham Church on the Isle of Wight. Queen Victoria was initially opposed to the match, but eventually she agreed to the marriage on condition that Prince Henry resigned his commission in the Prussian army and that the couple made their home with her. In the painting the Princess is accompanied to the altar by her brother, the Prince of Wales, and Queen Victoria. Her...
